name: Dragon Ball Z Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner Saiyan! Get a totally rad Dragon Ball Z name that's more powerful than a Kamehameha!
introduction: Ever wondered what your name would be if you were a Z Fighter or a fearsome villain in the Dragon Ball Z universe? Look no further! This generator will transform your ordinary moniker into something truly legendary. Prepare for awesome!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button. It's easier than powering up to Super Saiyan!
Don't like the name? Keep clicking! We've got more combinations than there are Dragon Balls.
Share your epic DBZ name with your friends and see who has the most powerful sounding alias!

faqs.question: Is this generator actually endorsed by Akira Toriyama?
faqs.answer: While we wish it were, sadly no. This is just a fan-made tool for fun. But hey, maybe he'll use it someday!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my Dragon Ball Z fan fiction?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Go wild! Just remember to give credit where credit is due (to the awesome power of random name generation!).

faqs.question: Will this generator give me a power level?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, no power levels are included. You'll have to sense that yourself, maybe try shouting really loud. (Results may vary.)

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the generated names?
faqs.answer: Keep hitting that 'Generate' button! With so many combinations, you're bound to find a name that resonates with your inner Super Saiyan. Or, you know, just refresh the page and start again.

faqs.question: Is this generator compatible with my scouter?
faqs.answer: Probably not, but it's definitely more stylish. Plus, it won't explode if someone's power level is too high. (Seriously, those things were unreliable.)

faqs.question: Can I request specific prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: While we can't take individual requests, we're always looking for ways to improve the generator! Feel free to send us your suggestions!
